items.title: New Israel-Gaza ceasefire plan proposed, Hamas source tells BBC
items.description: Egyptian and Qatari mediators suggest a truce of up to seven years and a permanent end to the war.

items.title: At least five killed after gunmen open fire on tourists in Indian-administered Kashmir
items.description: The region's chief minister said the attack was "much larger than anything we've seen directed at civilians in recent years".

items.title: Putin suggests Russia open to direct talks with Ukraine, as strikes continue
items.description: Moscow launched strikes across Ukrainian cities hours after Putin said he was considering a pause on civilian targets.

items.title: Who will be the next Pope? Key candidates in an unpredictable contest
items.description: Several names are in the fray as cardinals prepare to gather in the Vatican to elect Pope Francis' successor.

items.title: Vance calls for stronger India-US relations as trade talks progress
items.description: US Vice-President JD Vance is currently on a four-day visit to India with his wife and three children.
